summary: This mod adds 30+ companions from the popular DnD novels Forgotten Realms.
descriptionHtml:
*****************NEW MAR 20TH****************

UPDATED TO INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING: 

Obould I Many-Arrows - (Barbarian)(Greatswords/Battleaxe/Bow) Markarth 
Tarathiel - (Ranger)(Blades/Dual/Bow/Stealth/Alteration) Morthal 
Innovindil - (Ranger)(Blades/Dual/Bow/Stealth/Alteration) Morthal 


*****************NEW FEB 23RD*****************

UPDATED TO INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:

Minsc - (Barbarian)(Redguard)(Two-Handed/Bow/Light Armor) Falkreath
Zaknafein - (Ranger)(Dark Elf)(1-Handed/Dual/Light Armor/Stealth) Found exploring a Daedric Ruin.
Gromph - (CombatMystic)(Dark Elf)(Illusion/Alteration/Conjure/Restoration/Stealth) College of Magic.
Pwent - (1-Handed)(Nord/Dwarf)(One-Handed/Fist) Broken Fang Cave, joining the undead legion.
Athrogate - (1-Handed)(Nord/Dwarf)(One-Handed/Maces/Dual) Brittleshin Pass, searching for Pwent.

***************** NEW********************

NOW UPDATED WITH MORE COMPANIONS

Alassra Silverhand (Mage) College of Winterhold
Alustriel Silverhand (Mage) Living with a Solitude noble.
Narnra Shalace (Rogue) Looking for work in an inn.
Narn (Mage) Searching for his lost lover.
Kelemvor (2-Handed Warrior/Greatsword) Praying to Talos for guidance.
Cattie-Brie (Ranger/Alteration) Joining the Stormcloaks
Bruenor (1-Handed Axes) Joining the Stormcloaks
Artemis (Assassin/Blades/Dual) Having a drink in shadiest tavern.
Jarlaxle (Rogue/Locks/Dual) Having a drink in the shadiest tavern.
Erevis (Assassin/Blades/Dual) The Warrens.
Pikel (Druid) In an Inn
Ivan (1-Handed Warrior) In an Inn
Alicia Kendrick (Nightblade) Travelling with her parents
Deirdre Kendrick (Druid) A Thalmor spy
Miltiades (1-Handed Warrior/Blades) Hall of the Dead, but which one?
Regis (Rogue/Locks) Looking for treasure!
Danilo (Bard/Illusion) Studying with the best Bard\'s
Captain Deudermont (1-Handed/Dual) Having a drink while his ship is being repaired!

-I will do another update in a week if there are further requests. Or someone I missed.

*I have added my Heroes of the Lance (Dragonlance Companions) Mod to the files. I made that mod a while back, so I decided to share it as there is a lot of interest here for DND companions.

Adds:
Raistlin (Mage)
Caramon (Warrior/Blades)
Tika (1-Handed Blades)
Tanis (Archery)
Laurana (1-Handed Blades)
Tas (Stealth/Blade/Locks)
Sturm (2-Handed)
Goldmoon (Restoration/Alteration)
Riverwind (Barbarian/2-Handed)
Kitiara (2-Handed)
Silvara (Spellsword)
Gilthanas (Spellsword)


This mod adds 19 Companions from the popular DnD novels Forgotten Realms.

They are re-creations in the style of Skyrim, originally created by a variety of authors including, Elaine Cunningham, Ed Greenwood, and R.A. Salvator.

All of them are Marriageable and Essential.

They can all be found in a variety of Inns/Keeps/Forts, some are harder to find than others.

Alias - Nord (1-Handed/Shield)(Blade/Shield Perks)
Arilyn - Wood Elf (Assassin)(Blade/Stealth/Dual Wield Perks)
Cadderly - Nord (CombatMonk)(Restoration/Alteration/Archery) Recommend a crossbow.
Cyric - Imperial (Rogue)(Locks/Blade/Stealth/Dual Wield Perks)
Danica - Imperial (CombatMonk)(Fists/Stealth/Alteration Perks)
Dove - Nord (Ranger)(Archery/Blade/Stealth/Alteration Perks)
Dragonbait - Argonian (2-Handed)(Two-Handed Sword/Heavy Perks)
Drizzt - Dark Elf (Ranger)(Blade/Stealth/Dual Wield Perks). You can find him by doing Whiterun related quests. His swords Icingdeath and Twinkle are with him.
Elminster - Nord (Mage)(Destruction/Conjuration/Alteration/Restoration Perks) High Hrothgar. LVL 50
Khelben - Breton (Mage)(Destruction/Alteration/Conjuration Perks) Fort Amol.
Liriel - Dark Elf (Witchblade)(Blade/Destruction/Stealth Perks) Captured by bandits in a fort near Whiterun.
Midnight - Imperial (Mage)(Destruction/Conjuration/Alteration Perks)
Ren - Nord (Rogue)(Blade/Stealth/Dual Wield/Locks Perks). Has daggers Left and Right.
Robyn - Nord (Druid)(Mace/Restoration/Alteration/Lightning-Animal Shout Perks). With her lover Tristan investigating an abandoned towns rumors of an ancient dragon being revived.
Shal - Nord (Mage)(Destruction/Conjuration/Alteration Perks)
Shandril - Breton (Destruction Mage)(Destruction/Sneak/Fire Shout Perks) Poor ShandriL, ALWAYS IN TROUBLE! She touched a magical device and got teleported deep within a dangerous \"Labyrinth.\"
Storm - Nord (Bard)(Blade/Archery/Illusion/Alteration Perks) Bard College.
Tarl - Nord (Vigilant)(Restoration/Alteration/Mace/Shield Perks) Temple of Talos Markath.
Tristan - Nord (Ranger)(Blade/Archery/Stealth) With his lover Robyn investigating an abandoned towns rumors of an ancient dragon being revived.
Wulfgar - Nord (Barbarian)(2-Handed/Warhammer/Rage) Joining the Stormcloaks. Has his favorite weapon with him.

Installation:

Unzip files and copy/paste/merge them all into your data folder.

________________________________________________________________________________________

Required Mod:

Apachiskyhair 1.5 by Apachi - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
ApachiFemales by Apachi, 1.2 and 1.3
ApachiMales by Apachi
More Hair Colors (I have both files active) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27755

Let me know what you think, or any requests!

________________________________________________________________________________________

Recommended Mods: 
UFO - Ultimate follower overhaul. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037 

Better Males http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488 
Better Females http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812 
Body mods (Calientes) 
One of the sexy armor mods out there. (Skimpy) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654
SageOutfit http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10710 and/or http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9387 
Cloaks http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092 
Investigator Outfit (Arilyn) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19377
Fist Weapons - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7552 
Nordic Spears or Moar Combat - These are great weapon mods. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9700
Jswords (If you want to forge your own special weapons for them)
Wizard Hat (Several Mods including one for Gandalf on the nexus, and one called Zab\'s Witch hat on steam) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4198
Ballgown (Alustriel/Simbul) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25873
Haytham Kenway Apparel - Steam Workshop, great for Jarlaxle or even Deudermont.
Triss Armor Retexture (Dove) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4708
Black Swordsman Armor (Miltiades) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30797

________________________________________________________________________________________

Special Thanks:

Apachi for the beautiful ApachiSkyhair.
Bethesda for Skyrim.
Modders for all the beautiful mods.
Wizards of the Coast for all of Forgotten Realms. Along with their amazing authors for creating these characters.
author: scorpiovaeden
